pr_title: Fix a problem where env vars do not have the right ordinal

timeline.bodyText: We could return 300 directly as it's done in SysPropConfigSource
timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: Either way works for me.  There's only one instance of the class so there's no significant space difference either way.
replies.author: dmlloyd

replies.bodyText: Unless you want to increase your LoC report, I'd prefer to return 300 directly without changing the constructor.  :)
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: Ah, in this case it's important to make it be explicit to support #3670.
replies.author: dmlloyd

timeline.message: Fix a problem where env vars do not have the right ordinal
Also set system properties ordinal correctly
Also set system properties ordinal correctly
